name: Dragagochi
description:
Hello, I present to you a personal student project that I was asked to do during the summer vacations with the theme "Growing".

Dragagochi is a relaxing Tamagotchi inspired game where you have to take care of a little Dragon. You have to manage the Dragon's energy, hunger and joy. To make the dragon happy you'll have to play a 3D platformer mini-game, where you have to collect items giving different score to reach 50 points before the time limit.

I hope you will like the game and do not hesitate to tell me what you think of it !
